show_name: Call of the Wild: Howl, Buck (special)
other_title: Arano no Sakebi Koe: Howl, Buck
荒野の叫び声 吠えろバック (Japanese)
plot: Buck, a half German Shepard half Saint Bernard who's life is pretty peaceful and happy living with the Millers’ in California. However, one day he is tricked and sold off. He ends up in the snowy North where he has become a sled dog during the Gold Rush. His story takes many twists and turns and he has to fight for his own survival.
